pma:database.name: abc_cinema
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `booking` ( `booking_id` varchar(700) NOT NULL, `t_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`booking_id`), KEY `booking_ibfk_1` (`t_id`) USING BTREE, CONSTRAINT `booking_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`t_id`) REFERENCES `ticket` (`t_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `customer` ( `c_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `mobile` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(256) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`c_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2007 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `employee` ( `emp_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(256) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`emp_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=108 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
pma:database.pma:trigger: CREATE TRIGGER `update_staff_emp_id` AFTER INSERT ON `employee` FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE staff SET emp_id = NEW.emp_id WHERE emp_id = NEW.emp_id; END
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `feedback` ( `feedback_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Name` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `message` varchar(10000) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`feedback_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `movie` ( `m_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `m_name` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `m_language` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `genre` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `runtime` time NOT NULL, `description` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `trailer_link` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `m_status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`m_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=14 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `payment` ( `pay_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `total_amount` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `c_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pay_id`), KEY `c_id` (`c_id`), CONSTRAINT `payment_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`c_id`) REFERENCES `customer` (`c_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `shows` ( `date_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2023-01-16 10:30:00', `m_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `emp_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`date_time`), KEY `m_id` (`m_id`), KEY `emp_id` (`emp_id`), CONSTRAINT `shows_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`m_id`) REFERENCES `movie` (`m_id`), CONSTRAINT `shows_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`emp_id`) REFERENCES `employee` (`emp_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `ticket` ( `t_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ticket_price` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1200, `seat_no` varchar(5) DEFAULT NULL, `c_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `date_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`t_id`), KEY `fk_ticket_seat` (`seat_no`,`date_time`), KEY `c_id` (`c_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_ticket_seat` FOREIGN KEY (`seat_no`, `date_time`) REFERENCES `seat` (`seat_no`, `date_time`), CONSTRAINT `ticket_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`c_id`) REFERENCES `customer` (`c_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=133 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
